excerpt: "McQuinn helped draft and negotiate the 2020 National AI Initiative Act and the 2022 CHIPS and Science Act. The committee has been meeting with industry and academia for the last six months. In an interview Wednesday, McQuinn pointed to workforce issues and standard setting among others as areas of AI focus."
